content: You are an information extraction assistant.

Generate one fictional wikipedia style paragraph that contains at least 6 sentences and describes one or more following relation types: "screenwriter", "director", "cast member", "producer", "author", "composer”. The content of this generated fictional wikipedia style paragraph can be the description of a famous individual, military force, melodious song, renowned club, political party, captivating book, opera, video game, film, TV serie, remarkable country, mesmerizing artwork, distinguished organization or influential company in the world. Provide them in JSON format with just following keys: title, context.

Extract the entities in your above generated document. Provide them in List of JSON format with the following keys: entity, entity type. The entity type can be one of the following types: "Organization", "Location", "Time", "Person", "Miscellaneous", "Number", "Blank".

```json
[
  {"entity": "Jessica Richards", "entity type": "Person"},
  {"entity": "American", "entity type": "Location"},
  {"entity": "screenwriter", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "author", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "producer", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "film industry", "entity type": "Organization"},
  {"entity": "directors", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "actors", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "novels", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "composers", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "fans", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "worldwide", "entity type": "Location"},
  {"entity": "soundtracks", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
  {"entity": "entertainment industry", "entity type": "Organization"}
]
```

Present the relational triplets as (one head entity, one tail entity, one relation type), if a relationship exists between two entities. The relation type can be one or more of following relation types: "head of government", " country", " place of birth", " place of death", " father", " mother", " spouse", " country of citizenship", " continent", " instance of", " head of state", " capital", " official language", " position held", " child", " author", " member of sports team", " director", " screenwriter", " educated at", " composer", " member of political party", " employer", " founded by", " league", " publisher", " owned by", " located in the administrative territorial entity", " operator", " religion", " contains administrative territorial entity", " follows", " followed by", " headquarters location", " cast member", " producer", " award received", " creator", " parent taxon", " ethnic group", " performer", " manufacturer", " developer", " series", " sister city", " legislative body", " basin country", " located in or next to body of water", " military branch", " record label", " production company", " location", " subclass of", " subsidiary", " part of", " original language of work", " platform", " mouth of the watercourse", " original network", " member of", " chairperson", " country of origin", " has part", " residence", " date of birth", " date of death", " inception", " dissolved, abolished or demolished", " publication date", " start time", " end time", " point in time", " conflict", " characters", " lyrics by", " located on terrain feature", " participant", " influenced by", " location of formation", " parent organization", " notable work", " separated from", " narrative location", " work location", " applies to jurisdiction", " product or material produced", " unemployment rate", " territory claimed by", " participant of", " replaces", " replaced by", " capital of", " languages spoken, written or signed", " present in work", " sibling”.

```json
[
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "film industry", "relation type": "works in"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "directors", "relation type": "collaborates with"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "actors", "relation type": "collaborates with"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "novels", "relation type": "author of"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "composers", "relation type": "collaborates with"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "fans", "relation type": "has"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "worldwide", "relation type": "has fans in"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "soundtracks", "relation type": "collaborates on"},
  {"head entity": "Jessica Richards", "tail entity": "entertainment industry", "relation type": "works in"}
]
```
Present reasoning explannation of each relational triplet.
Present support sentence index for each extracted relational triple that shown in your generated document.

Organize the above triplet information in List of JSON format with the following keys: head entity, tail entity, relation type, reasoning explannation of each relational triplet, index of supporting sentence that shown in document,

```json
[
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "film industry",
    "relation type": "works in",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards is a screenwriter, author, and producer who operates within the film industry, creating content and contributing to the cinematic world.",
    "support sentence index": 0
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "directors",
    "relation type": "collaborates with",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards collaborates with directors in the film industry to bring her scripts to life on the screen, working together to realize her creative vision.",
    "support sentence index": 1
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "actors",
    "relation type": "collaborates with",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards collaborates with actors in her films, casting and working with talented performers to portray the characters she has written.",
    "support sentence index": 2
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "novels",
    "relation type": "author of",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards is the author of several novels, showcasing her storytelling skills beyond the realm of screenwriting and film production.",
    "support sentence index": 3
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "composers",
    "relation type": "collaborates with",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards collaborates with composers to create impactful soundtracks for her films, enhancing the emotional depth and atmosphere of her work.",
    "support sentence index": 4
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "fans",
    "relation type": "has",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards has a dedicated fan base who appreciate her work in the film industry, novels, and other creative endeavors.",
    "support sentence index": 5
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "worldwide",
    "relation type": "has fans in",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards' work has garnered fans worldwide, with her storytelling resonating with audiences across different countries and cultures.",
    "support sentence index": 6
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "soundtracks",
    "relation type": "collaborates on",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards collaborates on creating soundtracks for her films, working closely with composers to ensure the music complements and enhances the storytelling.",
    "support sentence index": 7
  },
  {
    "head entity": "Jessica Richards",
    "tail entity": "entertainment industry",
    "relation type": "works in",
    "explanation": "Jessica Richards is actively involved in the entertainment industry, utilizing her talents as a screenwriter, author, and producer to contribute to the diverse landscape of entertainment.",
    "support sentence index": 8
  }
]
```
